version_description:
Fixed iOS 7.1 compatibility issues:
- Refine by specialization and position level
- Directions in map view
- Education level

Now you can keep track of your application status through mobile
Get notified when employers start reviewing your application or invite you for an interview*

* The feature is currently available only for users in Malaysia. Support for all countries coming soon.
We have fixed some bugs and crashes
Improvements and bug fixes to improve app stability
Improvements and bug fixes for iOS 10 compatibility issues

What's New:
- Starting today, you'll notice a fresh look and feel in the JobStreet app. Every enhancement we make is to bring you a great job search experience and to connect you to the jobs that matter the most. All the core features you enjoy are still available, yet we are committed to deliver you more. We redesigned our app with an interface that is accessible to all, and have worked hard to enhance the in-app stability to ensure a smooth and fast experience.

Thank you for continuing to send feedback and helping us improve the JobStreet experience! We’re listening & committed to making your experience much better. Send us your feedback by emailing us at mobile@seekasia.com.

What's New:
- Starting today, you'll notice a fresh look and feel in the JobStreet app. Every enhancement we make is to bring you a great job search experience and to connect you to the jobs that matter the most. All the core features you enjoy are still available, yet we are committed to deliver you more. We redesigned our app with an interface that is accessible to all, and have worked hard to enhance the in-app stability to ensure a smooth and fast experience.

Bug Fixes:
- [FIXED] Some users were experiencing login issues.

Thank you for continuing to send feedback and helping us improve the JobStreet experience! We’re listening & committed to making your experience much better. Send us your feedback by emailing us at mobile@seekasia.com.

Thank you for using the New JobStreet Mobile App!

- [New] JobStreet has a new icon and look
- [Fixed] Some users were having trouble logging into the app
- [Fixed] Applications were having an error for some users
- Additional performance improvements and bug fixes

Thank you for continuing to send feedback and helping us improve the JobStreet experience! We’re listening & committed to making your experience much better. Send us your feedback by emailing us at mobile@seekasia.com.

Thank you for using the New JobStreet Mobile App!

- [Fixed] Some users were experiencing a crash issue
- [Enhancement] Loading performance was improved

Thank you for continuing to send feedback and helping us improve the JobStreet experience! We’re listening & committed to making your experience much better. Send us your feedback by emailing us at mobile@seekasia.com.

Thank you for using the New JobStreet Mobile App!

- [NEW] We've enhanced the design of our job ad details to make your job search experience easier and more efficient.
- [FIXED] Some users were not seeing recommendations on their home screen.
- [FIXED] When returning to the recommendations page, the app will now remember the last job ad viewed.

We’re listening & committed in making your experience much better. Email us at mobile@seekasia.com, your feedback will help us make a better product.

- [FIXED] When returning to the recommendations page, the app will now remember the last job ad viewed.
- [FIXED] Text overlap was causing some buttons to be difficult to read and click.

We’re listening & committed in making your experience much better. Email us at mobile@seekasia.com, your feedback will help us make a better product.
